skyux_character_count_message._description: Screen reader only label for character count

skyux_character_count_over_limit._description: Screen reader only label for character count over limit symbol
skyux_character_count_over_limit.message: You are over the character limit.

skyux_file_attachment_button_label_choos._description: Button label for single file attachment when input has no value

skyux_file_attachment_button_label_repla._description: Button label for single file attachment when file has been chosen

skyux_file_attachment_file_item_delete._description: Label for the button that deletes a file

skyux_file_attachment_file_item_remove._description: Label for the button that deletes a file in single file attachment

skyux_file_attachment_file_upload_drag_o.message: Drag a file here or click to browse

skyux_file_attachment_file_upload_link_i._description: Label for input to upload file
skyux_file_attachment_file_upload_link_i.message: Add a link to a file

skyux_file_attachment_file_upload_paste_.message: Paste a link to a file

skyux_file_attachment_label_no_file_chos._description: Label for single file attachment when no file is chosen

skyux_input_box_error_character_count._description: Error message for a field with a value that exceeds the character count limit

skyux_input_box_error_date._description: Error message for a field with an invalid date value
skyux_input_box_error_date.message: Select or enter a valid date.

skyux_input_box_error_email._description: Error message for a field with an invalid email value
skyux_input_box_error_email.message: Enter an email address with a valid format.

skyux_input_box_error_maxlength._description: Error message for a field with a value that is too long

skyux_input_box_error_minlength._description: Error message for a field with a value that is not long enough

skyux_input_box_error_phone._description: Error message for a field with an invalid phone number
skyux_input_box_error_phone.message: Enter a phone number matching the format for the selected country.

skyux_input_box_error_required._description: Error message for a required field without a value

skyux_input_box_error_time._description: Error message for a field with an invalid time value
skyux_input_box_error_time.message: Select or enter a valid time.

skyux_input_box_error_url._description: Error message for a field with an invalid URL value
skyux_input_box_error_url.message: Enter a URL with a valid format.

skyux_input_box_help_inline_aria_label._description: The accessible label for an input box help inline button
